name: Dr. Ali El Hadi Ismail Fawaz
title: Data Scientest - Associate Professor in Computer Science @ UHA - ENSISA - MSD-IRIMAS
abstract:
I am an Associate Professor in Computer Science at the Universite de Haute-Alsace, lecturer at ENSISA and researcher at IRIMAS institute in the MSD team, specializing in time series analysis. My research explores time series machine learning, focusing on tasks such as classification, regression, clustering, and generation, with a particular specialty in deep learning. The applications of my work span human motion sequences, remote sensing, and medical domains.
Author of the Deep Learning for Time Series Classification webpage in collaboration with Maxime Devanne and the MSD team. Core developer in the Python open source package aeon-toolkit for time series machine learning, leading and maintaining the deep learning modules.
